title: Integrating Indigenous Perspectives into Digital Learning Design: Protocol- and Critical Reflection-Based Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social work theories and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Process analyzing digital learning cases of indigenous communities through VR simulation, applying protocols, and performing critical reflection

learning_goals: Learners can describe three protocol elements that connect Indigenous knowledge systems with digital learning design principles.
Learners can develop one learning scenario considering cultural safety in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can diagnose their own cultural biases through critical reflective journaling and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
